publications.name: Magnetism in Copper Chloride Graphite Intercalation Compounds
publications.summary: Anhydrous copper (II) chloride was attempted to be intercalated in order to create controlled staging by annealing Madagascan natural flake graphite with copper (II) chloride powder in a low pressure, high temperature environment.

Responsible for build, test & release pipeline of the in-house High Frequency Trading platform.
Lead the engineering effort to automate research releases.
Lead the simplification of the testing pipeline by parallelising complex, long running overnight tests with an end goal of reducing an end to end 10 hour overnight sim to ~2 hours.
Introduced a merge queue into the platform's monolithic repository in an effort to reduce build breakages and speed up commit to production time.
work.summary: Responsible for Build, Test Release of High Frequency Trading Platform.

highlights:
Seeded a new team responsible for operational integrity of the in-house High Frequency Trading platform.
Responsibilities included (but not limited to):
  • Research test and release pipeline
  • Research release process
  • Overnight trading support
  • CoLo service provisioning
  • Batch compute
Scaled up to 7 high performing engineers with ranging experience levels.
Lead a mindset shift across the organisation by levelling up Operations Analysts to become Operations Engineers
Delivered an automated UAT framework leading to a 3x increase in platform version upgrades.
Transitioned a hand cranked release process to one orchestrated via a Business Process Engine enabling a 10x increase in research pipeline volume.
Provided team focus and stakeholder transparency by surfacing key insights surrounding the platform and research release processes.
Conducted active 1-to-1 career focused discussions resulting in direct reports transitioning from the Analyst Growth Framework to  Engineering Growth Framework.
Empowered engineers to take control of their learning during the organsation's transition to 'Cloud' technologies.
work.summary: Responsible for operational integrity of the in-house High Frequency Trading Platform.

highlights: Designed, developed and delivered a report monitoring portal leveraging C# WebAPI and AngularJS enabling business critical workflows to be monitored and debugged at a glance.
Lead the design of service allocation across global CoLo estate to maximise hardware usage
Automated the allocation of services across our service estate allowing for maximum use of hardware using linear programming techniques in python
Took ownership of production issues, testing and releasing software as well as dealing with adhoc queries.
Delivered a new client side web app, including choosing a JS framework, templating engine, building environment and deployment scripts leveraging AngularJS, Make, NodeJS, Grunt and Bower.
Took sole ownership of re-engineering a custom Excel add-in, written in C++ to C#, from scratch, to concurrently load data from a database via User Defined Functions.
Developed Sybase database views and stored procedures for the department’s RESTful API.
Developed ‘system resource viewer’ in order to determine correct Linux Control Group parameters for the department.
Took ownership of production issues, managing releases and dealing with ad-hoc data queries from business users.
work.summary: Responsible for the delivery of greenfield applications utilising many different technologies within 'Advisory and Research IT'

highlights: Placement started with 6 weeks intensive training covering the essentials of financial markets and technical training.
Responsible for regional change projects, audit remediation, incident management, testing disaster recovery across EMEA within Unix/Linux environment and often supporting Global change projects.
Developed various BASH scripts and Google Chrome extensions to speed up work.
Gained operational working knowledge with Red Hat Enterprise Linux 5+, Solaris 8+, enterprise storage, networking and OS performance analysis.
work.summary: Graduate Training Programme. Placed within 'Platform Services - Unix Service Delivery'

highlights: Programmed, tested and released a filtering system for an existing JAVA based online application release calendar.
Created, tested and implemented segregation system for Log4j filters; thus preventing existing filters being overwritten in future releases.
Advanced knowledge in Bash scripting, HTML, JAVA and JSP technologies.
